resources.string:
<html>
            <head>
                <style type="text/css">
                    @font-face {
                        font-family: tldr;
                        src: url("file:///android_asset/RobotoMono-Regular.ttf")}
                    body {
                        font-family: tldr;
                        font-size: 14px;
                        color: #%2$s;
                        margin: %3$fpx %3$fpx %3$fpx %3$fpx;
                    }
                    pre {white-space: pre-wrap;}
                </style>
            </head>
            <body>%1$s</body>
            </html>"
